AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG: [p]help Hpapi to see commands. Don't forget to set your key with [p]hpset apikey <your_key>. If you need a key, log onto mc.hypixel.net and do /api
NAME: Hpapi
SHORT: Cog for getting info from the Hypixel API
DESCRIPTION: Gets data from the Hypixel API including player stats, guild info, and active boosters
